title: (Amendment) Act 2023 (No. 4 of 2023), hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Communications Regulation
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Communications Regulation 
and Digital Hub Development Agency (Amendment) Act 2023 (Regulatory 
Provisions) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 10 June 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited communication regulation digital hub development agency (amendment) act 2023 (regulatory provisions) regulation 2023 (2) regulation shall come operation 10 june 2023

title: (Amendment) Act 2023 (No. 4 of 2023), hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 2. The following provisions are regulatory provisions for the purposes of
text_raw:
2. The following provisions are regulatory provisions for the purposes of 
Part 7 of the Communications Regulation and Digital Hub Development Agency 
(Amendment) Act 2023 (No. 4 of 2023): 

(a) Regulations 7 to 15, 29 and 30 of the European Communities 
(Electronic Communications Networks and Services) (Privacy 
and Electronic Communications) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 336 
of 2011); 

(b) Regulation 4 of the European Union (Retail Charges for 
Regulated Intra-EU Communications) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 
668 of 2020); 

(c) Regulations 4 and 8 of the European Union (Open Internet 

Access) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 343 of 2019); 

(d) Regulation 10 of the European Communities (Mobile Telephone 

Roaming) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 315 of 2022). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 June, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [304] 3
